VoiceDir3.A5F52: Nervous but trying to put on an air of confidence. Talking to The Boss, and trying to ingratiate yourself to them.
Line3.A5F52: Aye! I know I did wrong, but I brought you the troublemaker who wrecked our camp! A little gift, wrapped up nice!
VoiceDir1.B1281: Extremely pleased with yourself. You're talking down to a weasel-y subordinate who had his punishment coming.
Line1.B1281: Well well! Someone let you outta yer cage did they, rat? Suppose you learned your lesson?
